update.description:
Any modification to the connection table Python script or associated globals files presently elicits a prompt:

_Your connection table, or related files, have been modified. Please recompile your connection table for these changes to take effect._

This feature makes use of a revised`labscript_utils.FileWatcher` \([pull request #61](#!/labscript_suite/labscript_utils/pull-requests/61)\), permitting the prompt to disappear should watched files be restored to their earlier state.

A list of hashable\_types is attained from the BLACS/plugins section of labconfig. This must return a list of strings upon raw evaluation, of the form '.py', etc. The polling interval for hashable and non hashable types can now also be set using the value of polling\_interval \(in seconds\) in BLACS/plugins \(default 1s\).

TODO: Bump labscript\_utils version requirement upon the associated PR of labscript\_utils being merged.
update.title: Use hashable FileWatcher to detect changes to connection table and associated files

pull_request.title: Use hashable FileWatcher to detect changes to connection table and associated files
